relation: Electric window lifts front and rear, with remote closing function, anti-trap protection and one-touch operation
Windscreen washer system with two wiper speeds, intermittent wipe, rain sensor
Heated rear screen with auto off function
Electrically adjustable, folding and heated exterior mirrors, aspherical on drivers side
CDR-31 audio system, 7-inch colour touchscreen, radio with twin tuner, single CD drive supporting MP3 playback, 10 loudspeakers, total output 100 watts
Integrated aerial system for radio, navigation, telephone and TV functions (aerial features phase diversity in conjunction with CDR-31 audio system and scan diversity in conjunction with PCM)
Dual-tone horn, additional single-tone for alarm system
Overhead console with interior lights and LED reading lights, warning light for deactivation of front passenger airbag, controls for ParkAssist
Four sockets (12 volt) in centre console front and rear, glove compartment and luggage compartment

Further, up to date information on the individual vehicles can be obtained from your Porsche Centre. Consumption figures were obtained on the basis of standard equipment. Special equipment may affect consumption and performance.}
